message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that your job application for the position of {{ doc.position }} at {{ doc.company }} has been successfully created. Thank you for your interest in joining our team!

Job Application Details:

  • Position Applied For: {{ doc.position }}
  • Application ID: {{ doc.application_id }}
  • Job Opening: {{ doc.job_opening }}
  • Status: Your application is under review

We will get back to you soon with the next steps. In the meantime, feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Best regards,
The HR Team
name: HR Job Application Creation Mail
subject: Your Job Application Has Been Created Successfully
